result.execSummary:
The defendant Scott L. Best was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).
  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
10:02 a.m. Defendant Scott L. Best in court, in custody.  Michael William Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant wishes to proceed pro se - Waiver free and voluntary. Defendant enters no contest plea.   Court reads on waiver of rights and tendering plea. Waiver free and voluntary. Court finds that a factual basis for the plea exists and finds defendant guilty. Schiek statement - no charges on referral received by DA's office. Schiek/Court statement on sentencing.
Court Sentence
Court costs only 
DNA Sample
  The court informs defendant of right to request expungement of the DNA under Wis. Stat. 165.77(4).

Appeal rights given. Payment plan application given.
Adj. 10:23 am  Review hearing scheduled for March 19, 2018 at 03:00 pm.

1:20 p.m. Defendant Scott L. Best in court, in custody via video.  Jillian Pfeifer appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant states he has been in custody in Lincoln and Marathon County - past 60 days. Defendant states he has no resources or money to come back and forth to Oneida County - has an offer for residence/job in Merrill. Pfeifer statement to bond. Defendant statement to bond. Defendant states he would be willing to offer a no contest plea in exchange for cash forfeiture. Court sets bond. Adj. 1:26 p.m.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 13, 2017 at 10:00 am.
per Jack @ ONSO - in custody - ONSO
Per Ethan at ONSO - detainer in Marathon
2:25 p.m. Defendant Scott L. Best not in court.  Mary Sowinski appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Based on defendant's non-appearance, Court authorizes warrant. Adj. 2:26 p.m.

3:40 p.m. Defendant Scott L. Best in court.  Jillian Pfeifer appeared for the State of Wisconsin  along with DA intern, Eric Klemm, under the student practice rule. Defendant states that Marathon County case has been disposed - Defendant states he needs to pay child support in full and then will be eligible for driver's license - Pfeifer contacted Marathon County - requests adjournment to see if Marathon County will release hold on driver's license reinstatement. Bail continued. Adj. 3:44 p.m.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 16, 2016 at 02:00 pm.
Pre-trial conference on June 14, 2016 at 03:30 pm.

2:42 p.m. Defendant Scott L. Best in court.  Mary Margaret Sowinski appeared for the State of Wisconsin  along with DA intern, Eric Klemm, under the student practice rule. Defendant wishes to proceed on own - Waiver free and voluntary. Bail continued. Adj. 2:46 p.m.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 14, 2016 at 02:30 pm.
Must contact the Public Defender's office immediately upon release

Defendant Scott L. Best in court.  Mary Margaret Sowinski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
1:36
Sowinski statement -to status of case and possible new case - request defendant contact PD immediately - will hold off filing new case for her to speak to defendant's counsel - 
Court Questions defendant - Defendant statement - Court sets $  sig bond  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 23, 2016 at 02:30 pm.
per Mary @ ONSO - in custody - ONSO
per Judy @ ONSO - detainer - Marathon County
Amended Arrest Warrant Issued
2:59 p.m. Defendant Scott L. Best not in court.  Michael William Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin. State requests warrant - Court authorizes warrant based on  non-appearance. Adj. 3:00 p.m.
No operation of motor vehicle without valid driver's license.

1:54 p.m. Defendant Scott L. Best in court.  Michael William Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  In receipt of complaint, right to counsel - Schiek statement to bail - Court sets $  sig bond  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for January 25, 2016 at 02:30 pm.
